span.span: The namespace consists of a single class, , which contains information about the format of the audio that is being input to the speech recognition engine, or being output from the speech synthesis engine.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用的屬性來取得特定特性的音訊格式的相關資訊。You can use the properties of to obtain information about specific characteristics of an audio format. 這些屬性是唯讀，除了，您可以用於將設定區塊的對齊方式傳入的音訊。These properties are read-only, except for , which you can use to set the block alignment of incoming audio. 若要取得的連入的音訊格式的所有屬性，請使用方法。To get all the properties of the incoming audio format, use the method. 使用建構函式上類別，您可以指定任何的音訊格式的屬性，當您初始化物件。Using the constructors on the class, you can specify any of the properties of the audio format when you initialize the object.
